title: How Companies Are Lacking in Diversity Initiatives
itunes:title: How Companies Are Lacking in Diversity Initiatives
description:
Pamela Newkirk, Professor of Journalism at New York University, discusses her book Diversity Inc, on why companies spend so much on diversity initiatives and yet have so little to show for it. 

Hosts Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
